column4: CAN ANYone recommend an application for viewing VERY LARGE images? i have used ZGRViewer but i don't want to deal with Java right now
the light ones are good: viewnior, mirage, gpicview... even qiv.
i am rather looking for something that is made for viewing very large images. like, on the order of trillions of pixels
they all view them the same, I think...
